titles.title: Providing for further consideration of the bill (H.R. 3161) making appropriations for Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2008, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-290, by Mr. McGovern.

The rule provides that the amendments printed in part A of the Rules Committee report shall be considered as adopted in the House and in the Committee of the Whole. No further amendment shall be in order except those printed in part B of the Rules Committee report.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 100.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 599.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 225 - 197 (Roll no. 799).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 224 - 194 (Roll no. 800).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 8/2/2007--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3161) making FY2008 appropriations for agriculture, rural development, the Food and Drug Administration, and related agencies programs.
